```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

##Reading in the data used to create a simple model 
```{r}
climate=read_csv("climate_change.csv")
```
```{r}
wheat=lm(yield_wheat~mean+precip.x,data=climate)
summary(wheat) 
#intercept = 1.1851971
#mean_T = -0.0317005
#precip = 0.0116212

barley = lm(yield_barley~mean+precip.x, data=climate)
summary(barley)
#intercept =  1.682980 
#mean_T =     -0.045015
#precip =      0.016502
```
